title: Determination of trace heavy metal elements in litterfall by inductively coupled plasma optical emission spectrometry after extraction using choline chloride-based deep eutectic solvents
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22497-22503
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02573C, Paper

Junlei Zhong, Zhikun Wang, Yujie Chen, Weiwei Huan, Man Shi, Lixin Lei, Xuejun Yu, Liang Chen
Deep eutectic solvents based on choline chloride and maleic acid are effective in extracting Cd, Cu, Fe and Zn elements from litterfall materials.
